text: Thanks for the help <@U03N5FHUHQT> appreciate you taking the time

Hello everyone
Any idea about the, how can I found company profile image using Company API?

```{"status":"error","message":"Authentication credentials not found. This API supports OAuth 2.0 authentication and you can find more details at <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/auth/oauth-overview>","correlationId":"8cb95269-765b-42c6-9b76-012cae553d09","category":"INVALID_AUTHENTICATION"}  
[2024-03-19 09:45:22] production.ERROR: HTTP request returned status code 401:
{"status":"error","message":"Authentication credentials not found. This API supports OAuth 2.0 authentication and you ca (truncated...)
 {"exception":"[object] (Illuminate\\Http\\Client\\RequestException(code: 401): HTTP request returned status code 401:```
This errors pops up randomly in my API calls. Can someone help me with this?
Hello! Can anyone help me generate my API from HubSpot. How can I generate it?
hmm, that is a good idea.

Hi, I'm trying to query the data produced by a HubSpot report via the HubSpot API. Is that possible? Specifically, we display reports data via the dashboard (see image for example) and I'd like to use that data to display it somewhere else outside of HubSpot, so I'm trying to query the API and retrieve the report data.

I've tried
• Reproducing the queries with filters via the API, but the API is often too restricted to be able to reproduce the query correctly (there's this weird (and very useless...) limit of 3 filters per query which makes me unable to reproduce a query).
• Finding a way to query the data in the report directly from the API, but if it's possible, I ran out of juice to figure out how.
Any help is appreciated!

You could try HubSpot exports api: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/exports> you can get the data and add filters and you also could use a view with all the filters.

You can also embed the dashboard to another place outside of HubSpot, but it would be a link to the dashboard and everyone who needs to see it can have a view only account. Though I think this might not be what you’re looking for.

I tried getting the data and reproducing the filters, but somehow it's hard to reproduce the filters that the HubSpot website offers? It doesn't seem to match 1-1 and the constraint of having 3 filters maximum makes it impossible to reproduce certain reports!

But how would I figure out how to define my export, if I were to do this? I can read from the report's definition what data source it uses (somehow, the naming convention is a bit vague) and what filters were used on the HubSpot website, but I don't know how to match it with what the API would need to do the same thing
What are your reports filter requirements? What objects are included?
We check that certain properties of the report belong to one of many values and that the creation date fits within a date interval
the reports I'm dealing with are counting tasks, deals and activities that satisfy filters like the ones I just mentioned

Have you used Lists before? can you replicate the filter requirements in a Active list? If you can you can use the Export api to get the data you want:
```///Example request body
{
  "exportType": "LIST",
  "listId": 1234567,
  "exportName": "Marketing email contacts",
  "format": "xlsx",
  "language": "EN",
  "objectType": "CONTACT",
  "objectProperties": [
    "email"
  ]
}```

I have not used lists before! How do I figure out how to define the request body? Is there some API documentation on how to export deals, tasks, activities?

(I'm not a HubSpot user, I'm just trying to help my company decipher the API :sweat: I don't know if deals/tasks/activities are built-in HubSpot concepts or data structures my company built)
In HubSpot, deals and activities(tasks, meetings, calls, emails) are objects but your company might have custom properties. The API can get you this information. Where are you testing the API?
Locally on my machine, I have credentials and can make API calls but I'm using the HubSpot NodeJS package, I'm not making HTTP calls directly at the moment (I could if necessary)
I believe they have custom properties on them, yes.
What api are you using?
you free to hop on a call? do you have a meeting link you could send?
That would be lovely! I'll send you a DM, let's arrange that

Hi everyone,
I want to change quote status hs_payment_status to PAID. Is it possible to do using API?

I have payment system that is not supported by HubSpot and want to automatically update quote status when I get payments.
What do you mean by generating API?

Hello everyone!

I'm currently working on a way to _send_ information to my HubSpot. I'm using the _Kiwify_ platform to sell infoproducts and would like to _send_ sales data, abandoned carts, among other things, to HubSpot. I considered using _Webhooks_, but it seems that HubSpot doesn't support this method of sending information. Is there any other viable possibility to achieve this integration? I appreciate any help you can provide!
Hello Wallison, I believe HubSpot supports sending webhook via workflow and receiving webhook (in beta).
I talked to the technical support, and they told me that HubSpot only sends the webhook. Do you have the link to this information for me to verify? Thanks!

I recently saw it on a client's workflow but it was in beta.

Trigger workflows from webhooks (_Operations Hub Professional_ and _Enterprise_ only)
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/workflows/set-your-workflow-enrollment-triggers#trigger-workflows-from-webhooks>
Tech sometimes give the incorrect answers given that they don't fully understand what you are trying to achieve. Happened to me sometimes because they are not developers as they said.
Thank you!
Hello everyone, we are trying to relate HubSpot Activities (Email/Calls etc.) to Marketing campaigns, is there an API for this ? Thanks in advance.

Hello everyone, we are trying to retrieve goal target details by using API <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/goal_targets/> , but we found for all the targets the returned 'hs_assignee_user_id' does not match any of the users in our system, could someone help me to check if this is a bug? Thanks in advance : )
Hi everyone! Do you know if it's possible to automatically send quotes that include stripe payment with the API? Thank you for your help!

To my knowledge, if you don’t have payments set up with HubSpot, then the hs_payment_status will not be enabled. Alternatively, you could have a custom property on the deal with the payment status that you can update using API
I can look, send me a DM with a meeting link? Or you can share a screenshot of your results?

When you’re sending quotes you can include the stripe payment option but only from the UI. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/quotes#:~:text=Please%20note%3A%20the%20quotes%20API%20does%20not%20support%20creating%20quotes%20with%20payment%20processing%20through%20Stripe%20or%20HubSpot.%20You%20also%20cannot%20configure%20recurring%20quote%2Dlevel%20discounts%2C%20fees%2C%20or%20taxes%20through%20the%20API.%20To%20use%20these%20features%2C%20you%20can%20instead%20create%20the%20quote%20in%20HubSpot.%C2%A0|HubSpot doesn’t support sending the payment on a quote with the API>.

Don’t think you can change it except for manually.
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Lists-Lead-Scoring-Workflows/How-does-HubSpot-apply-contact-record-and-company-pictures/m-p/19047>
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/records/change-record-image>
Hello Team, is there a way to unmute or mute a video with the hsVideoApi??? is there a clear documentation of this??? TY!
Seems still not possible? I can not find anything in the Documentation.
correct the payments api (released today!) is currently read only
Was just playing with that one and - there was nothing to create Payment Links :)
yeah unfortunately just read only at this point
Well One Day :slightly_smiling_face:
Getting closer!!

Hello @here,

We are working on custom workflow actions and implementing the `inputFieldDependencies` field. We noticed two dependency types: `SINGLE_FIELD` and `CONDITIONAL_SINGLE_FIELD`.

Question: We have not found any documentation on this third dependency type: `CONDITIONAL_MULTIPLE_FIELDS`. Does it exist? If so, where can we find the syntax?

HubSpot documentation: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions>

Thank you very much for your help.
Greg

Hello <@U04FNHJ0U2J>,

I don't know if you work at HubSpot and if you could help, but it doesn't hurt to ask :sweat_smile:
I don’t work at HubSpot :sweat_smile: I’ve not built a custom workflow action! I read a few slacks and I think the documentation on this is missing and not clear.
Where did you see the  `CONDITIONAL_MULTIPLE_FIELDS`? Other people on here haven’t mentioned it so I’m thinking it doesn’t exist.
Maybe <@U03REFNRMB3> could give you some insight though

Oh, okay :+1:
I've never seen that dependency type mentioned anywhere. I just thought that a `CONDITIONAL_MULTIPLE_FIELDS` could exist since we have a `CONDITIONAL_SINGLE_FIELD` :grin:
<@U04FNHJ0U2J> - The answer

Hello @here,

I’m working on custom workflow actions and would like to insert some conditional logic in the `actionCardContent` based on the user input. HubSpot has this feature in the *Increase or Decrease property value* workflow action. The card content will display _Increase_ or _Decrease_ depending on the sign of the numeric value input field.

Can you please help?

Thanks,
Greg

Hello Gregory, how are you?
What seems to be the problem?
